about.title: About BusUrbano
about.description: Web app to find stops and arrival times for urban buses, Spain.
about.sw_not_supported: Service Workers are not supported in this browser
about.update_available: New version available! A notification will appear to update.
about.up_to_date: You already have the latest version.
about.update_error: Error checking for updates. Try reloading the page.
about.clear_cache_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the cache? This will remove all locally stored data.
about.cache_cleared: Cache cleared. The page will reload to apply changes.
about.reset_pwa_confirm: Are you sure? This will delete ALL app data and restart it completely. Use only if there are serious cache issues.
about.update_help: If you're having issues with the app or don't see the latest features, use these buttons to force an update or clear stored data.
about.details_table: The timetable can be shown in two ways:
about.details_regular: Stops are shown in the order they are visited. Apps like Infobus (Vitrasa) use this style.
about.details_grouped: Stops are grouped by bus line. Apps like iTranvias (A Coru√±a) or Moovit (more or less) use this style.

stoplist.no_favourites: Go to a stop and mark it as favourite to see it here.

timetable.noDataAvailable: No timetable data available for today
timetable.errorDetail: Theoretical timetables are updated daily. Please try again later.

common.404: The requested page could not be found.
